TopicTitle: Stuck with the above posters avatar (Redux)

Articles.Content:
I enter again in floor 26 and wish we could just have the original B-3

oh and ps tidus its breaking not braking. :3
i get in the lift with an aggressive corgi, i talk to him while inquisitively daydreaming badass things
I get in the lift at 28 again and sits on Spearka's leg.

I get in the lift at 30 floor, the archive, with a folder full of cute corgi picture.

"You will not belive what I found in the archive..."

take out a picture

"See?"

i get back on the lift at floor 31 and give a discerning look at pample not only for being tits but because I prefer German Sheperds to corgis

Edited December 10, 2013 by Spearka

The door opens at floor 32. I notice that I appear to be a bit too big for the elevator. Pushing myself through the door, I begin to hear the slow sound of the cracking of bones and the tiny explosion of a jetpack. Snugly in, I feel the piercing pain of a a energy beam piercing my side. It slowly stops due to my state of tranquil grace. And so I finally get some peace and quiet.
The door opens at floor 33, The Doctor runs out of it. He tells me to run. I do.
I enter the elevator and I see a vending machine so I buy a drink.
I get on the lift at floor 35 and see fire. I call the fire department and run at floor 36.

I walk into the elevator and I'm suddenly in earth orbit. With text.

What do I do?
I get in the lift at floor 37 and find a high cube person who thinks he is in space...."facepalm"
I remain on the lift as it goes to floor 38, it seems a bit sparse
I fly my planes into the lift at floor 39. The lift seems roomy enough for air combat. I shoot down a guy on a jetpack as the lift moves up to floor 40
I return to the lift as it goes to floor 40 following shenanigans
I get in on floor 41, and cry over the fact that I have no idea what that is.
I get in on floor 42. Upon seeing a His majesty Swinub the Third on the lift I immediately try to get on his good books and decide that whatever floor he gets off at i get off at too.
I get on the lift to floor 43 to see an invisible guy on fire...what
Floor 43, YOU AGAIN?! LEAVE MY DOMAIN, NON-SWINUB.
You get crushed by a 600km wide object.
I get on after the elevator has been fixed(bump) and see kerbin.....HOW DA WHA???
I get on floor two and see a green thing.

1-The doors open

2-I see that it's bigger on the inside

3-???

4-Profit! (And small talk about how the day has been)

1-The doors open

2-I see that it's bigger on the inside

3-???

4-Profit! (And small talk about how the day has been)

I kill it and make dancing squid dish.
47. I see a blank nothingness that I pour water onto.
I see the train, dissasemble, then go back in time and invent the train!
